1.title: Library Management System
desc: Library Management Web App with Flask.
Implemented features like login, signup, book issue, book return, book search, etc.
Uses SQLite database to store books, user details and other data.

2.title: SecureTalk
desc: A TCP/IP chat client and server using Python.
Options to encrypt messages with a code.
Was used by 8-10 friends for personal communication

3.title: SAP Attedance Bot
desc: Telegram bot to send attendance from the SAP Portal of my university.
Uses python and selenium web scrapping to get data from the SAP Portal.
Currently used by 13 friends to track their attendances.
